text:
Like, thousands of parents, carers and family members of people with a #LearningDisability, Jo is worried when her son will receive the #COVID19 #vaccine. 😔

Help us make everyone with a learning disability a priority to receive it. 💉

Email your MP: https://t.co/y3kFBs9WLw 👈 https://t.co/PdkTKG1jlb
